author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Regional Provident Fund Commissioner-II, Sub Regional Office, Vellore, Himanshu Kumar, will be conducting “Nidhi Aapke Nikat” on February 10 for redressing grievances of Employees Provident Fund (EPF) subscribers / employers / exempted establishments.

The subscribers / employers / exempted establishments have been advised to avail the opportunity to redress their grievances.

The public should register their grievances by February 8 so that the grievances can be redressed on February 10.

Timing

The meeting will be held for subscribers from 10.30 a.m. to 1 p.m., while it will be from 3 p.m. to 4 p.m. for employers and from 4 p.m. to 5 p.m. for exempted establishments.

The employers have been advised to participate in large numbers to discuss about the recent developments and clarify any doubts/issues in EPF and MP Act, 1952.

The subscribers / employers / exempted establishments can register their grievances, which are pending for more than a month, through post / fax – fax no. 0416-2254 340 or email – sro.vellore@epfindia.gov.in.

They should furnish their Provident Fund Account number / PPO number and the nature of grievances along with telephone number / fax no / email id by super scribing the envelope “Nidhi Aapke Nikat” to the Public Relations Officer, Sub-Regional Office, S-1, TNHB, Phase-III, Sathuvachari, Vellore-632 009, the release said.
title: PF redressal meet to be held on February 10
